title: [Health] A small dose of cannabidiol (CBD) does not appear to negatively affect a personâ€™s ability to drive. But that is not the case for tetrahydrocannabinol (THC), the primary substance responsible for the intoxicating effects of marijuana.

[Neuroscience] Scientists reconstructed the real-world social network of a small village using functional connectome data from the brain. The results suggest that patterns of functional brain activity during rest encode hidden similarities that are associated with friendship.
